basics.name: Md. Rasel Mandol
basics.label: Undergrad Student
basics.summary: Undergrad student, currently studying at NIT Meghalaya, India. Actively involved in research projects, and I love to explore and learn unknown things.

work.name: All India Institute of Medical Sciences, Raebareli
work.position: Software Developer and Machine Learning Intern (Hybrid)
work.summary: Developed and implemented deep learning models for lumbar spine image classification, segmentation, and annotation. Engineered advanced software tools for spine image analysis, significantly improving image interpretation efficiency.

work.name: CVML Lab, NIT Meghalaya
work.position: Machine Learning & Cybersecurity Researcher, Software Developer
work.summary: Working on quantum cryptography, semi-teleportation, and medical image analysis. Developed ML models for spine, polyps, and breast cancer. Built software for quantum experiments and research model testing.
highlights: Engineered software to acquire and measure quantum experiment readings
Developed machine learning models for medical image segmentation, annotation, and classification (Polyps, Breast Cancer, Spine)
Engineered three software applications for testing classification and segmentation models
Conducted research on quantum cryptography and semi-teleportation for secure communication

activities/fun-time.organization: Cognitia - Annual Tech Fest of NIT Meghalaya
activities/fun-time.position: Team Lead & Website Developer - Capture the Flag (CTF), Game of Codes
activities/fun-time.summary: Led and organized Capture the Flag and Game of Codes events during Cognitia 2023. Designed and developed the official website for the CTF competition.
highlights: Built and deployed the full website for managing and conducting the CTF event

publications.name: Enhanced Quantum Cryptography Using Single Particle State Rotation
publications.publisher: SN Computer Science | 7th International Conference on Data Analytics and Cyber Security (DACS 2024)
publications.summary: This research explores improving Quantum Cryptography through single particle state rotation. By manipulating the quantum states of individual particles, it is possible enhance the security and efficiency of cryptographic protocols using a secure quantum channel.

projects.name: Quantum Cryptography Using Single Particle State Rotation
projects.summary: Developed a quantum cryptographic method to enhance communication security and created a new approach for advanced bit loss and error detection protocols.

projects.name: Deep Learning-Based Lumbar-Sacral Medical Image Analysis
projects.summary: Engineered software incorporating deep learning models for precise medical image segmentation, annotations, and accurate measurements of anatomical features.

projects.name: Fake Profile Detection
projects.summary: Developed a deep learning model and a browser extension to identify fake profiles on social platforms (e.g., Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn), enhancing online safety and mitigating digital fraud.

extracurricular.title: Undergraduate Research Lead
extracurricular.summary: Led an undergraduate research team in the CVML (Computer Vision and Machine Learning) Lab at NIT Meghalaya.

extracurricular.title: Content Creator
extracurricular.summary: Making videos based on Cyber Security/Ethical Hacking, Malware Analysis, and Deep Learning on YouTube occasionally.
